member.summary: Provides access to the string resources of this assembly, also allowing for their customization.
member.remarks:
Call the method to return a resolved resource string. If a custom string has been set for a specified string resource name, it will be returned. Otherwise, the default string resource value is returned.
If any of the resource strings are customized via a call to , it is best to do so before any other classes in this assembly are referenced, such as in the application startup.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.PropertyGrid.PropertyGrid.TextInputFocusDelegates
member.summary: Gets a mapping between control types and associated delegates to be performed when a text input is received by a .
member.value: A mapping between control types and associated delegates.
member.remarks: When a PreviewTextInput event is raised on a , the PropertyGrid will attempt to find the first focusable element in the header container. The focusable element type will be used to find an associated delegate in the TextInputFocusDelegates dictionary, if a matching entry is found then it will be executed. Exact type matches will be used first, then each base type will be queried.
